thread.title: Maggie
thread.title_full: Bambi Baby Store - Furniture, Strollers and More! reviewed by Maggie

author: Maggie
title: Maggie
text:
Received my order promptly and on time. Website is easy to navigate and communication was awesome on the whereabouts my order. They supplied a tracking number and emails.
This was also the cheapest we found our mattress priced that was purchased.
